fields.content:
Great tastes are hard to come by

Our question was simple: Why? Why can't finding tastes you love be easy, social, and fun? Now they are, with Vinely.

It may look like we have a great time (which we do), but when it comes to taste, we mean business. Serious business. The proof? Our patented Vinely Methodology - a proven system, thoughtfully engineered to define your true Vinely Personality. (It's not rocket science, but it's not far off.)

At each and every Vinely Taste Party, this methodology is hard at work, separating the Moxies from the Sensational. The Exuberant from the Easygoing. And the Whimsical from the Serendipitous. In turn, you'll be introduced to tastes that fit your Vinely Personality - tastes you won't be able to get enough of.

We're not out to change the things you enjoy. Fact is, we're here to help you embrace them even more! And with a Vinely Personality, there's nothing stopping you from finding wines that entice, excite, and encourage you to taste Your Personality every chance you get.

What are you waiting for?

CHANGE THE WAY YOU EXPERIENCE WINE.

Vinely is the fun, easy way to discover wines you’re sure to love.

We learn about your tastes at a private tasting party for you and your friends. Then we hand-select wines, perfectly matched to your tastes, and deliver them right to your door. Interested?

Taste.

Enjoy a private wine tasting with friends. A Vinely Pro will lead everyone through the simple, Vinely tasting experience.

Rate.

At the party, sip, savor, and rate each wine. Each rating provides an insight we'll use to uncover your tastes in wine, which we call your ‘wine personality’. You might be Whimsical, Exuberant, Sensational, Moxie, Easygoing, or Serendipitous.

ORDER.

Once your personality has been revealed, leave the rest to us. You can order wine, which we’ll hand-select to match perfectly with your taste, and deliver it right to your door. It’s a delicious, personalized surprise, every time!

REPEAT.

Did you like it? Did you love it? The more you drink, the better we get to know you. Giving Vinely feedback helps us hone in further on your tastes, bringing you one step closer to discovering your perfect wine. Place orders one shipment at a time, or become a VIP and receive orders monthly, bimonthly, or quarterly.

{% load static %} Hey, {{ first_name }}! We're thrilled about your interest in becoming a Vinely Pro. We will review your application soon and get back to you within the next 48hrs. If you haven't heard anything in 48 hours, please contact a Vinely Care Specialist at (888) 294-1128 ext. 1 or email us. {% if sig %}
{% endif %} Your Tasteful Friends, - The Vinely Team

{% load static %} Hey {{ host_first_name }}! We're thrilled about your interest in hosting a Vinely Taste Party! Since you already have a Vinely Pro in mind, they will soon be in contact to set a date and time. If you haven't heard anything in 48 hours, please contact a Vinely Care Specialist at: (888) 294-1128 ext. 1 or email us. {% if sig %}
{% endif %} Your Tasteful Friends, - The Vinely Team

{% load static %} Hey, {{ first_name }}! We're thrilled about your interest in hosting a Vinely Taste Party! To ensure you'll be the host with the most, we'll need to pair you with a Vinely Pro. They'll be reaching out soon. If you haven't heard anything in 48 hours, please contact a Vinely Care Specialist at (888) 294-1128 ext. 1 or email us. {% if sig %}
{% endif %} Your Tasteful Friends, - The Vinely Team

{% load static %} Hey {{ applicant.first_name }},
Your application to become Vinely Pro has been approved. Your Pro account number is {{ pro_account_number }}. Please keep that for future reference. You may now login to your account and start recruiting hosts for your taste parties! Go have some fun wine parties! {% if sig %}
{% endif %} Your Tasteful Friends, - The Vinely Team

{% load static %} Hey, {{ first_name }}! We have some good news and some bad news. The Bad News: Vinely does not currently operate in your area. (Bummer, right?) The Good News: Your interest in Vinely is super important to us! So much, in fact, that when we do expand to your area, you'll be the very first to know. If you have any questions, please contact a Vinely Care Specialist at (888) 294-1128 ext. 1 or email us. {% if sig %}
{% endif %} Your Tasteful Friends, - The Vinely Team

WHERE'S THE WINE PARTY? YOUR PLACE!

Host a lighthearted, private wine tasting with friends, discover your very own wine personality, and earn rewards from Vinely. How?

Find Some Time.

Schedule a Vinely Taste Party and you’ll be on your way to a very tasteful experience. You can either organize the party with a Pro you know, or we can find one for you.

Find Some Friends.

You got ‘em, so get ‘em to your place! We recommend 8 – 12 people. Your Vinely Pro will be glad to help you through the party planning process.

Order a Tasting Kit.

Order a Tasting Kit from Vinely.com. It’s quick and easy. Kits start at $75 and include six wines and everything you need for guests to sip, savor, and rate.

Get rewarded.

At the Taste Party, guests can place orders based on their personality. The more they order, the more rewards you get!
Vinely's Story

Your Vinely Wine Personality is determined by the flavor preferences that characterize your taste in wine.

You can uncover yours at a Vinely Taste Party, where you’ll sip, savor, and rate wines with your friends. Vinely takes your feedback and runs it through a system developed by leading wine experts and scientists. The system uses this information to uncover your unique taste characteristics and reveals your wine personality.

Will you be Whimsical, Serendipitous, Sensational, Exuberant, Moxie, or Easygoing?

Curious to find out? Learn how!
So, you want to uncover your wine personality?

Want to conduct vinely taste parties and get paid to do it?

Help people discover their true taste in wine, and earn money while doing it! Vinely makes it easy for you to lead tasters through the learning experience. It’s simple, fun, and best of all, it’s profitable!

Find a Group

Identify hosts who want to invite friends or family to their homes for a Vinely Taste Party. Also, if we get contacted by a host who doesn’t know a Pro, we may introduce you.

Guide the Party

Conducting a party is simple and fun. As a Pro, you’ll help the host set up before the party and ensure the tasting goes according to the party plan. No wine experience needed! We’ll provide the training and tools to make sure you succeed.

Uncover Personalities

Once tasters have sipped and savored, you’ll be able to input their ratings into the Vinely web-based system, which quickly identifies each guest’s individual Wine Personality.

Help Place Orders

Lead guests through the ordering process on Vinely.com. All transactions are then processed by Vinely.

Get Paid

You’ll earn based on the success of each party!
IT’S FUN. IT’S EASY. IT WORKS.
We call it lifelong learning through drinking. It all starts with a Vinely Taste Party...

Join us November 27th, 2012 for a Vinely Holiday Taste Party open house from 5:00 pm to 8:00 pm at Brush Studio at Brush Studio located in Gaslight Village - East Grand Rapids.

WHAT’S A VINELY TASTE PARTY?

Think of it as learning through drinking. It’s part wine tasting. Part personality test. And part...well...party.

Kick off the holiday season as our guest at the Vinely Holiday Taste Party. The wines you’ll sample will give us an idea of your personal taste. The flavors you enjoy and the ones you could do without. After sipping, savoring, and rating each wine, we’ll assign you one of six Vinely Personalities. Then, we’ll be able to send wines perfectly paired to your taste - right to your doorstep.

A VINELY WINE PERSONALITY = A FUTURE OF WINES YOU'LL LOVE

With Vinely you can discover up to 144 wines a year you never knew you loved conveniently shipped right to where you sip. At Vinely we separate the Moxies form the Sensational. The Exuberant from the Easygoing. And the Whimsical from the Serendipitous.

Come early, stay late but promise you will come November 27th to Brush Studio.

BONUS

Get your creativity on during the Vinely Holiday Taste Party. Brush Studio will be offering painting that evening for a discount to any of our guests. $20 will get you all materials as well as instruction if you need it.

Tell us you’ll attend! You know you want to!


{% if fb_view %} Sign Me Up {% else %} Sign Me Up {% endif %}

But where’s the parking?

Don’t let parking stand in your way. The parking in Gaslight Village is always free. Find a spot on the street or in the parking structure behind the sail sculpture.

Questions

Contact a Vinely Care Specialist at care@vinely.com or call 1.888.294.1128 ext: 1
